channel.title: Comments on: A Glance of Plan Explorer Proâ€™s Deadlock Analysis
channel.description: A Technical Community for IT Professionals

item.title: By: Kevin Kline
item.dc:creator: Kevin Kline
item.content:encoded:
Great blog post, Ted! You provide a lot of great information about deadlocks, including a full repro, as well as an excellent call-out to features in Plan Explorer. (Available for free at at http://sqlsentry.net/plan-explorer/sql-server-query-view.asp).

Oh, and add a Plan Explorer tag please. I know you’ve written other articles about it.

Great stuff! Many thanks,

-Kev
